Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near California.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
